metadata.title: Type 1 interferons as a potential treatment against COVID-19

abstract.original_text: Type 1 interferons have a broad antiviral activity in vitro and are currently evaluated in a clinical trial to treat MERS-CoV. In this review, we discuss preliminary data concerning the potential activity of type 1 interferons on SARS-CoV-2, and the relevance of evaluating these molecules in clinical trials for the treatment of COVID-19.

sentences.segment_text: Type 1 interferons have a broad antiviral activity in vitro and are currently evaluated in a clinical trial to treat MERS-CoV .
In this review , we discuss preliminary data concerning the potential activity of type 1 interferons on SARS-CoV-2 ,
and the relevance of evaluating these molecules in clinical trials for the treatment of COVID-19 .
